Description: Energy efficiency of the stock in Northern Ireland. [Northern Ireland House Condition Survey SAP (Standard Assessment Procedure) Time Series]. (Basically a subset of House Condition Survey Main Data Tables but with previous years data)
Name: NI house condition survey sap 2001-2016 appendix tables
Notes: Summary of data relating to housing energy efficiency contained in NI Housing Condition Survey 2016 but with previous years' data also. Produced by the Housing Executive's Research Unit.
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified under heading Download the 2016 reports below: (towards the bottom of the page), labelled as ni house condition survey sap 2001-2016 appendix tables
Sizing Notes: Series of multi-table tabs, but only simple dimensions
